reviews.review: Jogo muito legal, n preçisa de um computador muito bom não, e nem preçisa pagar nada só se você quiser.
Tirando os Hack é um jogo mto TOP

Finally I have redownloaded the game only to find it out has become free to play. After numerous warnings from friends I have tried again. However I have simply found that there are far too many hackers nowadays. It is simply unplayable, one of my favorite games to play with friends. Ruined by rampant hacking and trolls.
Ranks are screwed up. Trolls everywhere.
